name: PS, I Love You Quiz | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.text: How did Holly Kennedy's husband, Gerry, pass away?
questions.explanation:
Brain Tumor.

	After suffering from migraines, Gerry went to the doctor to be told he needed glasses. The diagnosis was incorrect and by the time the brain tumor was found it was too late to save him. Gerry died in his own bed on an early February morning with Holly by his side.

questions.text: For Holly's first letter that Gerry sent her after his death, what did he ask her to do?
questions.explanation:
Buy a bedside lamp.

	Because Holly and Gerry always "argued" about who was going to get out of bed to turn off the light, Gerry gave Holly strict orders to buy a bedside lamp in his first letter after his death. Holly purchased a new lamp and then wondered why she and Gerry didn't buy one in the first place.

questions.text: When one of Gerry's letters asked her to perform at a karaoke night, she was terrified to perform but did it anyway. In front of friends, family, and strangers, what song did Holly perform at Club Diva?
questions.correct: With a Little Help from My Friends
questions.explanation:
With a Little Help from My Friends.

	Holly performed karaoke during a date night with Gerry years earlier and broke her nose after falling off the stage. She vowed never to do anything like that again. While ill, Gerry set it up for Holly to perform in a karaoke contest in Club Diva. Holly hid in the bathroom until her friend Sharon gave her the strength to perform. Holly performed "With a Little Help from My Friends".

questions.text: Holly and her friends were celebrating what milestone while her brother went along to film a student documentary on clubbing in Ireland?
questions.explanation:
Holly's 30th birthday.

	Holly's 30th birthday was celebrated with a night out with her friends. Her younger brother, Declan, went along with them to film a documentary on clubbing in Ireland. The next morning, none of the women remembered anything about the night before. It wasn't until they watched Declan's documentary called "Girls in the City" did they know what happened the night of Holly's 30th birthday party.

questions.text: The November before Gerry died, he booked a one-week trip for Holly and her two friends to what country?
questions.explanation:
Spain.

	Gerry went to Swords Travel Agents to book a trip for Holly, Sharon and Denise to Lanzarote, Spain for a one-week girls vacation. In Gerry's letter to Holly, he stated that it was the place they wanted to go on their honeymoon but couldn't. The travel agent that helped Gerry plan the trip told Holly the story of the day Gerry came into the agency.

questions.text: In a letter to Holly, Gerry urged her to find a job that she loved. On her list of jobs she could have, what was not one of the choices?
questions.explanation:
Boxer.

	After reading Gerry's letter to her, Holly sat down and made a list of sixteen possible jobs. Only one of the sixteen held possibilities for her. In the end, Holly applied for a job working in advertising at a magazine called "X". She got the job and her own office.

questions.text: Where was Holly at and who was she with when she ran into Gerry's parents?
questions.correct: Italian restaurant with her friend, Daniel
questions.explanation:
Italian restaurant with her friend, Daniel.

	Holly needed Daniel's help with an article she was writing about a new drink called Blue Rock for the magazine. Daniel insisted on eating at an Italian restaurant. After working on the article and eating dinner, Holly left the restaurant only to run into Gerry's parents. They were visibly upset when they saw Holly with another man.

questions.text: In the letter that Gerry wrote Holly for the month of October, what did he add to it?
options: A ticket to the Christmas ball
questions.explanation:
Pack of seeds.

	Holly hated the month of October so Gerry put a pack of seeds in his letter to her for the month of October. He wanted the seeds to brighten her day. For his and Holly's friend John, he left a note wishing John a happy 32nd birthday and asking him to take care of both of their wives.

questions.text: During the hen party for Denise, Holly met a drunk man named Stevie and his hateful girlfriend Laura in a bar at the Galway Inn. What did the drunk man do to Holly?
options: Ripped up her note from Gerry
questions.explanation:
Kissed her.

	Holly shared a room with Denise and Sharon. When Holly couldn't sleep one night, she went down to the bar. The bartender gave her a drink and some conversation. While she was there, a drunk named Stevie hit on her. While she was trying to get back to her room, Stevie kissed Holly and Holly pushed him away.

questions.text: Gerry's last note came in December before Denise's wedding. Taking Gerry's advice to find someone new to love, Holly began dating Daniel at the end of the book.
questions.explanation:
No.

	Daniel realized that Holly wasn't ready to begin a relationship with any one and he went back to dating his ex-girlfriend.
